name: The Legend of the Raven's Roar
name_original: The Legend of the Raven's Roar
description:
Inspired by the intense "counterspell wars" in Magic: The Gathering, The Legend of the Raven's Roar is a physical turn-based card game where two knights face off in a battle of hearts (, diamonds, cups) and swords in order to claim the title of Raven Lord.

To play The Legend of the Raven's Roar, you only need a standard deck of playing cards and a way to track both players' life points.

Download the Rules PDF or check them through the screenshots to get more information on how to play the game.
